name: Public
description: Every user is included into this group. This group is not dependent on the event/events.

name: Board Member
description: Board members are included into this group. This group is not dependent on the event/events.

name: Superadmin
description: Members with the is_superadmin flag set to true are included into this group. This group is not dependent on the event/events.

name: Organizer
description: Event organizers are included into this group. This group is dependent on the event/events.
